message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that you've expressed interest in. I'm asking for $90 for it.  Let me know if that works for you!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer.  I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $87. Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go up to $87. How about we meet in the middle at $86?
